properties.entry: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL,SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_YN) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET PHONE = ?, EMAIL = ?, JOB_CODE = ?, SALARY = ?, BONUS = ? WHERE EMP_ID = ?
DELETE FROM EMPLOYEE E WHERE E.EMP_NAME = ?
SELECT E.EMP_NAME, D.DEPT_TITLE, J.JOB.NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E, DEPARTMENT D, JOB J WHERE (E.EMP_ID = ?) AND (E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_ID) AND (E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE)
